name: Angles
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Angles
description:
Angles

The orientation of the face relative to the image.

See Face.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"
face = image.face

face.angles.roll #=> -5.1492119
face.angles.yaw #=> -4.0695682
face.angles.pitch #=> -13.083284

methods.name: roll
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Angles#roll
methods.description: Roll angle. Indicates the amount of clockwise/anti-clockwise rotation of the face relative to the image vertical, about the axis perpendicular to the face.

methods.name: yaw
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Angles#yaw
methods.description: Yaw (pan) angle. Indicates the leftward/rightward angle that the face is pointing, relative to the vertical plane perpendicular to the image.

methods.name: pitch
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Face
Angles#pitch
methods.description: Pitch (tilt) angle. Indicates the upwards/downwards angle that the face is pointing relative to the image’s horizontal plane.
